commentBody: "You can argue that many teams and coaches pay the same attention to detail, put in the same hours without the reward of winning." And then there's the story in today's Times mentioning that last year's Broncos didn't prepare much for the Colts in the playoffs, focusing on the expected-upcoming game with the Patriots.  Limited sample, but the Broncos are good, disciplined, etc., and if they don't give the same attention to detail the Patriots do, who are these many teams that do so?  I think it's surprisingly rare.
